text: Gĩcigo kĩu gĩgaatuĩka gĩcigo kĩamũre kĩa athĩnjĩri-Ngai. Gĩgaakorwo kĩrĩ kĩa ũraihu wa mĩkono 25,000 mwena wa gathigathini na wariĩ wa mĩkono 10,000 mwena wa ithũĩro, na wariĩ wa mĩkono 10,000 mwena wa irathĩro, na ũraihu wa mĩkono 25,000 mwena wa gũthini. Handũ-harĩa-haamũre hagaakorwo harĩ gatagatĩ ga kĩo.
